official_title: A resolution recognizing and commending Lee Iacocca for his contributions to the preservation of the Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island.

summary.text: Recognizes and commends Lee Iacocca for his leadership, diligence, and ability to unite millions of Americans in the crusade to preserve the Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island.

titles.title: A resolution recognizing and commending Lee Iacocca for his contributions to the preservation of the Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island.
